channel.title: Memes on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Memes on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: No One Knows What 'Terminally Online' Means Anymore
item.description: The memes and online footprint of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect Tyler Robinson don’t place him neatly in a box, though many are still trying.

item.title: No One Knows What 'Terminally Online' Means Anymore
item.description: The memes and online footprint of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect Tyler Robinson don’t place him neatly in a box, though many are still trying.

item.title: Bullets Found After the Charlie Kirk Shooting Carried Messages. Here’s What They Mean
item.description: The inscriptions on bullets recovered near the scene of Charlie Kirk’s murder appear to reference video games like Helldivers 2 and online furry role-play, not a legible political ideology.

item.title: Bullets Found After the Charlie Kirk Shooting Carried Messages. Here’s What They Mean
item.description: The inscriptions on bullets recovered near the scene of Charlie Kirk’s murder appear to reference video games like Helldivers 2 and online furry role-play, not a legible political ideology.

item.title: Labubus Are on Track to Be a Billion-Dollar Business This Year
item.description: Pop Mart, the Chinese company behind the Labubu franchise, has sold $670 million worth of related products so far this year—more than iconic US toy lines Barbie and Hot Wheels.

item.title: Labubus Are on Track to Be a Billion-Dollar Business This Year
item.description: Pop Mart, the Chinese company behind the Labubu franchise, has sold $670 million worth of related products so far this year—more than iconic US toy lines Barbie and Hot Wheels.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Using Memes to Turn Mass Deportation Into One Big Joke
item.description: Memes shared by the White House, DHS, and ICE have used catchy TikTok tunes to normalize mass deportation and Christian nationalist narratives. Experts say that’s the point.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Using Memes to Turn Mass Deportation Into One Big Joke

item.title: The case for memes as a new form of comics
item.description: Both comics and memes rely on the same interplay of visual and verbal elements for their humor.
